description: Housed in an old wood- and stone-built mill, this restaurant boasts an elegant, romantic and stylish dining room with large windows offering views of a stream surrounded by greenery. Here, the talented chef creates personalised cuisine with a focus on modern fish and meat dishes that include the occasional hint of Asian influence.
